AltName.entry: GIRLS FRIENDLY SOCIETY AND TOWNSEND FELLOWSHIP

Desc.entry: A registered charity and world wide society of the Anglican church working with girls and women. Any girls from the age of 7 years and over are welcome to share in activities which include outdoor and indoor games, craft workshops, drama, discussions, outings and get togethers which are organised by trained and authorised adult leaders.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
